tasks.label: Run current file
args: ext="${fileExtname}"; ext=${ext#.}; case "$ext" in c) gcc "${file}" -o "${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" ;; cpp) g++ "${file}" -o "${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" ;; py) python3 "${file}" ;; js|mjs) node "${file}" ;; ts) npx ts-node "${file}" ;; go) go run "${file}" ;; rs) cargo run ;; java) javac "${file}" && java "${fileBasenameNoExtension}" ;; sh) bash "${file}" ;; zsh) zsh "${file}" ;; lua) lua "${file}" ;; php) php "${file}" ;; rb) ruby "${file}" ;; pl) perl "${file}" ;; html) (command -v xdg-open >/dev/null 2>&1 && xdg-open "${file}") >/dev/null 2>&1 & ;; *) echo "No runner configured for extension: $ext" ;; esac

tasks.label: Start live-server
args: tmux has-session -t live-server 2>/dev/null || tmux new-session -d -s live-server 'live-server'
